presentation\/index.md.Jeedom est une solution domotique Open-S: Jeedom is an open-source and *cloudless* home automation solution (without server in the cloud)
presentation\/index.md.Il fonctionne sans abonnement, ce qui pe: It works without subscription, which guarantees the functioning of your home automation without internet, as well as the security of your data.
presentation\/index.md.Il est également extrêmement ouvert, mul: It is also extremely open, multi-protocol, customizable, and highly scalable
presentation\/index.md.Jeedom propose un noyau, le Core, embarq: Jeedom offers a core, the Core, embedding the structure and the central functions
presentation\/index.md.Les équipements, comprenant des actionne: Equipment, including actuators or sensors, is organized by objects
presentation\/index.md.Les objets peuvent, par exemple, représe: Objects can, for example, represent physical parts
presentation\/index.md.Toutes les informations sont historisabl: All the information can be saved (temperature curve, consumption, door openings, etc.), and accessible in Analysis → History or from the Dashboard tiles
presentation\/index.md.Les scénarios permettent d'automatiser t: Scenarios allow you to automate all or part of your equipment
presentation\/index.md.Ils sont construits avec différents bloc: They are built with different blocks
presentation\/index.md.Des blocs conditionnels (Si Alors, Sinon: Conditional blocks (If Then, Otherwise), actions, programming (IN x minutes or A hhmm), loop, comment, or php code
presentation\/index.md.Tous les blocs sont imbricables les uns: All blocks are nestable into each other, offering endless possibilities
presentation\/index.md.Le système d'interaction dans Jeedom per: The interaction system in Jeedom allows you to perform actions from text or voice commands
presentation\/index.md.Le centre de mise à jour permet de mettr: The update center allows you to update all of Jeedom's functionality, including the core software and its plugins
presentation\/index.md.D'autres fonctions de gestion des extens: Other extension management functions are available (delete, reinstall, check, etc.)
presentation\/index.md.Autour de ce noyau viennent se greffer d: Around this core are plugins, which can be of all kinds
presentation\/index.md.Ces plugins peuvent être installés depui: These plugins can be installed from the Market and allow you to extend the possibilities of Jeedom
presentation\/index.md.Jeedom permet à n'importe quel plugin de: Jeedom allows any plugin to chat with another on a standardized basis
presentation\/index.md.Cela permet par exemple d'utiliser les p: This allows for example to use the thermostat or alarm plugins with any home automation protocol or even an IP plugin or communicating object ...
presentation\/index.md.Plusieurs tutoriels vidéo ont été réalis: Several video tutorials have been made to show the important features of Jeedom, facilitate its use and familiarize the user with the software.
presentation\/index.md.Cependant depuis la réalisation de ces t: However since the realization of these tutorials, the Jeedom interface has been able to evolve and functionalities added
presentation\/index.md.La documention reste donc la référence à: The documentation therefore remains the reference to consult in case of needs, questions, etc.
presentation\/index.md.Voici la liste des tutoriels disponibles: Here is the list of available tutorials
presentation\/index.md.Débuter avec Jeedom (Objet, Market, Plug: Getting started with Jeedom (Object, Market, Plugin, Module)
presentation\/index.md.Les scripts dans Jeedom à l'aide du plug: Scripts in Jeedom using the Script plugin
presentation\/index.md.Les scénarios dans Jeedom avec le plugin: Scenarios in Jeedom with the Weather plugin
presentation\/index.md.Plugin DataTransfert, les Backups Auto e: DataTransfert plugin, Auto Backups and Dropbox
presentation\/index.md.Vitrine découverte d'une installation st: Discovery window of a standard installation
